title: A serious discourse between two lovers this song will teach young men to wooe, and shew young maidens what to do, nay it will learn them to be cunning too : to the tune of When sol will cast no light, or Deep in love / by John Wade.
author: Wade, John, fl. 1660-1680.
publisher: Ptinted [sic] for P. Brooksby at the Golden-Bull in West-Smithfiled [sic],
